attributes.action: demand that Russia apologises for humanitarian and illegal crimes by the Soviet Union, e.g. Katyn massacre, annexation of Karelia, and also returns Karelia to Finland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A demand to the Russian government to accept, acknowledge and apologise for crimes and illegal acts perpetrated by successive Soviet Union governments. These would include the massacre at Katyn and others elsewhere, reparations for environmental damage in Estonia, and the illegal annexation of Karelia and Petsamo, and their immediate return to Finland.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
